name: Running on Time LDJAM47
description:
!! The WebGL version doesn't appear to like how inputs work. Please download the Win32 build.

Trains.

Deliver needed supplies to stop pawns from raiding the Capitol.

The numbers on the station platform indicate which resources the station needs to repel the incoming pawns.

LMB to load and unload trains while at a station.
RMB to slow the train down.

R Restart
Esc Quit

Post-Jam note:
We scrapped our initial idea on Saturday so this is massively underbaked. We hope you enjoy the idea just the same!
